column1: #Text=Warden says : " Get the fugitives and throw them in the cooler ! "
#Text=Male guard # 2 says : " Uh ... they are in a cooler , sir . "
#Text=Warden says : " One that 's bolted down and not floating in the water !
#Text=If my dad 's not there , we 've risked everything for nothing .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Come on , come on ... "
